releases.description: The http layer is now fully managed with custom middleware injectable, additionally all output content-type is now inferred.
changes: [manual change required] nodegenDir in the .nodegenrc file now has value 'src/http'
[manual change required] app.ts now only calls @/src/http, see the latest src/app.ts in github for how it should now look
[manual change required] server.ts now must call the http.start() function returned, see the latest server.ts in github for how it should now look

releases.description: Giving the express app back to the developer in app.ts
changes: [feat] The express app is returned in the http module
